text: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Based on ancient texts, scholars had concluded that humans once wielded formidable magical power. However, the source of energy that once spanned the Earth that gave humans the ability to wield magic, Mana, had mysteriously vanished in the past.

Based on ancient texts, scholars had concluded that humans once wielded formidable magical power. However, the source of energy that once spanned the Earth that gave humans the ability to wield magic, Mana, had mysteriously vanished in the past. Today, most are unaware that humans had wielded magic in the past, as technology had replaced it and was now what modern civilization depended on. That is until, a group of explorers stumbled upon a mysterious temple, in the jungles of Central America.

That is until, a group of explorers stumbled upon a mysterious temple, in the jungles of Central America.



The explorers were a group of scientists and archaeologists, who were studying the ancient ruins of the temple.

Based on ancient texts, scholars had concluded that humans once wielded formidable magical power. However, the source of energy that once spanned the Earth that gave humans the ability to wield magic, Mana, had mysteriously vanished in the past. Today, most are unaware that humans had wielded magic in the past, as technology had replaced it and was now what modern civilization depended on. That is until, a group of explorers stumbled upon a mysterious temple, in the jungles of Central America.

The explorers were a group of scientists and archaeologists, who were studying the ancient ruins of the temple. They were not sure what was the purpose of the temple, but they were surprised to see that it was in good shape despite how ancient it appeared. The explorers decided to explore the temple, and were surprised to see that it was filled with strange artifacts. Upon examining the artifacts, they learned it was a form of written records, that detailed the energy source that other more modern texts referred to as Mana. The researches were pleased, they had found the oldest records on the planet that mentioned Mana, meaning that the people that built the temple could also tap into it to wield magic.

The researches were excited to learn more about the ancient civilization that had built the temple, but they were surprised to find that the temple was far bigger than it appeared from the outside. They ventured deeper into the temple, taking note of its pristine design and craftsmanship. They ventured deeper, wondering to themselves if they should turn back, until they stumbled on the main chamber of the temple.

That is until, a group of explorers stumbled upon a mysterious temple, in the jungles of Central America.

The explorers decided to explore the temple, and were surprised to see that it was filled with strange artifacts. Upon examining the artifacts, they learned it was a form of written records, that detailed the energy source that other more modern texts referred to as Mana. The researches were pleased, they had found the oldest records on the planet that mentioned Mana, meaning that the people that built the temple could also tap into it to wield magic. 

The researches were excited to learn more about the ancient civilization that had built the temple, but they were surprised to find that the temple was far bigger than it appeared from the outside. They ventured deeper into the temple, taking note of its pristine design and craftsmanship. They ventured deeper, wondering to themselves if they should turn back, until they stumbled on the main chamber of the temple. In the main chamber was a large room with a massive stone slab in the middle of it. The stone slab appeared to be written in an ancient language, with some archeologists being able to translate it once they took a closer look at it. The translated text revealed that the slab was a record of the civilization that built the temple, and their discovery of Mana. The slab surprisingly, also detailed how Mana was created by the civilization. It revealed that the civilization had used Mana to create a powerful weapon, that they used to fight off a powerful enemy, that was not from this planet. The machine to create Mana was thus submerged into the ocean, so it would not fall into the wrong hands. What remaining Mana that was created, was mentioned by the slab would be temporary, and would eventually run out.

The explorers decided to explore the temple, and were surprised to see that it was filled with strange artifacts. Upon examining the artifacts, they learned it was a form of written records, that detailed the energy source that other more modern texts referred to as Mana. The researches were pleased, they had found the oldest records on the planet that mentioned Mana, meaning that the people that built the temple could also tap into it to wield magic. 

The researches were excited to learn more about the ancient civilization that had built the temple, but they were surprised to find that the temple was far bigger than it appeared from the outside. They ventured deeper into the temple, taking note of its pristine design and craftsmanship. They ventured deeper, wondering to themselves if they should turn back, until they stumbled on the main chamber of the temple. In the main chamber was a large room with a massive stone slab in the middle of it. The stone slab appeared to be written in an ancient language, with some archeologists being able to translate it once they took a closer look at it. The translated text revealed that the slab was a record of the civilization that built the temple, and their discovery of Mana. The slab surprisingly, also detailed how Mana was created by the civilization. It revealed that the civilization had used Mana to create a powerful weapon, that they used to fight off a powerful enemy, that was not from this planet. The machine to create Mana was thus submerged into the ocean, so it would not fall into the wrong hands. What remaining Mana that was created, was mentioned by the slab would be temporary, and would eventually run out.

The explorers were shocked by the discovery, and decided to inform the world of their discovery. Thus several countries around the world took on many endeavors to scan the ocean for the ancient machine, in the hopes of creating more Mana. For many, the purpose may as well have been nefarious , as the Mana could be used to create powerful weapons. Others hoped it could be used as a cleaner and safer energy source to power the cities of the world. The search for the ancient machine was long and arduous, with many countries having to give up on the search. If the machine existed, it would be at the deepest parts of the ocean, far from the reach of modern humans. It would be for the best, as who knows what may happen if Mana was once again discovered, with no threat of an outwardly enemy, would Mana be used for good or evil? Only time would tell, should the ancient machine be discovered by those that continue to search for it.
